title: Wood Half-Elf
content:
eingCharmed, and magic can't put you tosleep. Darkvision: See in the dark up to 12 m.

Wood Half-Elf Tips & Notes

During Early Access, the Wood Half-Elf race used to feature +2 Charisma and another +2 Ability points of their choice. This has been changed in the full launch of BG3 and the Ability Score points are now associated with the Class that players will choose. Unlike Dungeons and Dragons 5th Edition, Wood Half-Elves do not gain proficiency in two skills of their choice or proficiency wit
